QuotaExceededError.summary: NOTE Experimental The QuotaExceededError interface represents an error when a requested operation would exceed a system-imposed storage quota.

blockquote.para: In browser versions before this interface was implemented, it was a regular DOMException. The subclassing allows for extra information like quota and requested to be included.

QuotaExceededErrorQuota.summary: NOTE Experimental The quota read-only property of the interface returns the system-defined storage quota (in bytes) that the operation attempted to exceed, or undefined if the information is not available.
QuotaExceededErrorQuota.value: A number representing the quota limit in bytes, or undefined.

QuotaExceededErrorQuotaExceededError.summary: NOTE Experimental The QuotaExceededError() constructor creates a new QuotaExceededError object.

QuotaExceededErrorRequested.summary: NOTE Experimental The requested read-only property of the interface returns the number of bytes that were requested when the error occurred, or undefined if the information is not available.
QuotaExceededErrorRequested.value: A number representing the requested amount of storage in bytes, or undefined.
